org.eclipse.utm.parseSource

Class ParseSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.core.runtime.PlatformObject
      • org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.InternalJob
        • org.eclipse.core.runtime.jobs.Job
          • org.eclipse.utm.parseSource.ParseSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable, org.eclipse.core.runtime.IAdaptable

    public class ParseSource
extends org.eclipse.core.runtime.jobs.Job
    A class that parses source files and enters relevant information into the UTMDB - an SQL database
    Author:
    Thomas Colborne, Ziyad Daghriri
